paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Two germline mutations in BRCA2 (A2466V and N372H) were found.

functional_data.summary: The mutations A2466V and N372H are considered benign.

variants.segregation_data: The mutations do not segregate with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The mutations were reported as benign in familial breast cancer.
key_quotes: In ClinVar, A2466V and N372H are considered as benign mutations in familial breast cancer.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data is based on the provided text and variants were confirmed to be in BRCA2.
